dexscreener.parameters:
https://api.dexscreener.com/latest/dex/pairs/:chainId/:pairAddresses
chainID	string ethereum | bsc | polygon | etc..
pairAddress	string	One or multiple, comma-separated pair addresses (up to 30 addresses)
https://api.dexscreener.com/latest/dex/tokens/:tokenAddreses
tokenAddress	string	One or multiple, commaseparated token addresses (up to 30 addresses)
https://api.dexscreener.com/latest/dex/search/?q=:q
q	string	query E.g:WBTC or WBTC/USDC
